SEARCH
Package Login

Class DisplayManager

java.lang.Object
Login.DisplayFormat
Login.DisplayManager
Direct Known Subclasses:
AdminDisplayManager, DoctorDisplayManager, PatientDisplayManager, PharmaDisplayManager, RequestFormController
public class DisplayManager extends DisplayFormat
Manages the display of various screens and messages for the Hospital Management System, including welcome, login, and error screens. This class provides formatted output using the inherited display utilities from DisplayFormat.

      public static String loadErrorMessage(String errorMessage)
      Displays an error message centered on the screen if the error message is not empty.
      Parameters:
      errorMessage - The error message to display.
      Returns:
      An empty string, as this method only displays the message.
